description:
Carry a single reservoir for all your backcountry water needs. The Hydro Trek's unique shape slips into hydration sleeves, but also loads in the top of your backpack, so it keeps the load balanced and is easy to access. At basecamp, flip it over, attach the push-button spout and you have a water jug to suppy your backcountry kitchen.

  • Polyethylene film that's BPA and PVC free
  • Round shape fits in the top of a pack or in a hydration sleeve
  • 3D design speeds drying time and discourages bacteria growth
  • DryLock magnetic bite valve locks off for leak-free travel
  • Rubber fill port fits 38mm pump filters and included push-button Basecamp Tap
name: Gregory 3D Hydro Trek 3L - Unisex
